name: Ascension (KatAsunderSweet, DobraStudios, Astor Barnes, ⊱ĭ⊰)
description:
Find the escape from the loop of darkness of this house. But BEWARE, mind your steps cause you will only have 100 before everything starts over.

-Ascension was born during the Indie Spain Jam 2022 Theme: 0 to 100-

           Press E to interact             Press TAB to open notebook

·Program, music and sound // Katrina Gutierrez

·Art // Astor Barnes

·Design and narrative // Heloise Arce
